comments:
When connecting to our Jira Server via Mylar, the following error is reported.
We are using Mylar over HTTPS using a certificate.

-- Error Log --
Date: Thu Mar 01 12:16:33 CET 2007
Message: Unable to retrieve query results from https://jira.int.sys.netSSLContextImpl is not initialized
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar.tasklist
Stack Trace:
